title: Stories of the Border Marches
author: Lang, John
snippet: In that same storm a young shepherd, within sight of his own father,fell over a precipice near Birkhill, and, with spine hopelessly injured,lay helpless amongst the snow-covered boulders in a place inaccessibleto the distracted father.

title: Reminiscences of Yarrow. Edited and annotated by ... Professor Veitch, LL.D. Illustrated by Tom Scott ... Second edition
author: Russell, James
snippet: Onesad accident took place near Birkhill, where a fineyoung shepherd fell over an icy precipice, and wasby his father seen lying apparently killed in a ravinedangerous of approach, and where, unaided, he washelpless to render assistance.
